LanguageData.KokuSuicidevest.label: Suside
LanguageData.KokuSuicidevest.description: This is a suicide vest with destructive power.
LanguageData.KokuSuicideVestBomb.label: bomb detonator
LanguageData.KokuBionicClaw.label: bionic claw
LanguageData.KokuBionicClaw.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
LanguageData.KokuBionicGunArm.label: bionic gun arm
LanguageData.KokuBionicGunArm.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user and is equipped with a built-in autopistol.
LanguageData.KokuBionicEMPArm.label: bionic EMP arm
LanguageData.KokuBionicEMPArm.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user and is equipped with a built-in EMP launcher.
LanguageData.KokuBionicIncendiaryArm.label: bionic incendiary arm
LanguageData.KokuBionicIncendiaryArm.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user and is equipped with a built-in incendiary launcher.
LanguageData.KokuBionicSmokeArm.label: bionic smoke arm
LanguageData.KokuBionicSmokeArm.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user and is equipped with a built-in smoke launcher.
LanguageData.KokuBionicFireBreathJaw.label: bionic fire breath jaw
LanguageData.KokuBionicFireBreathJaw.description: One of the most sophisticated jaw replacements. Is equipped with a built-in flamethrower.
LanguageData.KokuAdvancedBionicClaw.label: advanced bionic claw
LanguageData.KokuAdvancedBionicClaw.description: Is it still an arm? It gives the user extremely extreme strength.
